About SchoolStore

Welcome to Schoolstore, The easiest way of installing stuff from scripts up to games and social media on your school laptop.

At schoolstore, we have everything you would need to get through a 2-3 hour ELA Class (example).

Our Mission

Our mission at SchoolStore is to make it easy for anyone to discover, download, and install the best apps and scripts for your school laptop. We believe that everyone should have access to SchoolStore no matter what class you are in (just dont get in trouble.

Visit our test sites used before we switched to github
